mapper.select: SELECT R.rxDetailID,M.chnName medicineName,R.goodsID, R.eachQuantity,R.dayNum,R.adviceType, R.quantity,R.frequency,R.num, M.minunit unit, M.matchInstrID instructionID, R.dosage,R.groupID,R.orderID ,R.audit,M.antiClass,M.producer,D.chnName generalName,M.dose,M.medicineID FROM ${RxDetailTable} R LEFT JOIN Medicine M ON R.goodsID=M.goodsID LEFT JOIN Drug D ON D.drugID=M.matchDrugID WHERE R.clinicID=#{clinicID:INTEGER} ORDER BY R.rxNo,R.groupID,R.orderID

select count(distinct A.serialNo) vdPatient,count(distinct case when B.serialNo IS not null then B.serialNo else null end) antiVdPatient, count(distinct case when B.serialNo IS not null and C.serialNo IS not null then B.serialNo else null end) antiVdEmerPatient from (select serialNo,convert(varchar(10) ,prescribeDate,120)pDate from ${RxDetailTable} where dosage like '%vd%' and prescribeDate>#{fromDate:TIMESTAMP} and prescribeDate < #{toDate:TIMESTAMP}) A left join (select serialNo,convert(varchar(10) ,prescribeDate,120)pDate from ${RxDetailTable} where goodsID in(select goodsID from Medicine where antiClass>1) and prescribeDate>#{fromDate:TIMESTAMP} and prescribeDate < #{toDate:TIMESTAMP}) B on A.serialNo=B.serialNo and A.pDate=B.pDate left join (select serialNo,convert(varchar(10) ,prescribeDate,120)pDate from Rx where clinicType = '急诊方' and prescribeDate>#{fromDate:TIMESTAMP} and prescribeDate < #{toDate:TIMESTAMP}) C on A.serialNo=C.serialNo and A.pDate=C.pDate

select COUNT(distinct rx.serialNo) emergPatient, sum(rd.money) emergDrugMoney, count(distinct case when M.antiClass>1 then M.goodsID else null end) emergAntiDrugNum , sum( case when M.antiClass>1 then rd.money else null end) emergAntiDrugMoney from Rx left join ${RxDetailTable} Rd on rx.serialNo=rd.serialNo left join Medicine M on M.goodsID=Rd.goodsID where rx.prescribeDate>#{fromDate:TIMESTAMP} and rx.prescribeDate < #{toDate:TIMESTAMP} and rx.clinicType='急诊方'

SELECT TOP ${limit} a.serialNo,A.patientName,A.prescribeDate,a.chnName drugName,a.spec,A.quantity,A.minUnit,A.dosage,A.eachQuantity,A.dayNum,A.adviceType FROM (SELECT R.rxDetailID, R.serialNo,Rx.patientName,R.prescribeDate,M.chnName,M.spec,R.quantity,M.minUnit,R.dosage,R.eachQuantity,R.dayNum,R.adviceType FROM ${RxDetailTable} R LEFT JOIN Rx ON R.rxID=Rx.rxID LEFT JOIN Medicine M ON R.goodsID=M.goodsID )A
WHERE rxDetailID < ( SELECT min(rxDetailID) FROM (SELECT TOP ${start} rxDetailID FROM ${RxDetailTable} R LEFT JOIN Rx ON R.rxID=Rx.rxID LEFT JOIN Medicine M ON R.goodsID=M.goodsID
ORDER BY rxDetailID DESC ) A )
ORDER BY rxDetailID DESC
SELECT count(R.rxDetailID) FROM ${RxDetailTable} R LEFT JOIN Rx ON R.rxID=Rx.rxID LEFT JOIN Medicine M ON R.goodsID=M.goodsID
